02036 C  N.A. TSYGANENKO, SPRING 1994, ADJUSTED FOR THE BIRKELAND FIELD AUG.22, 1995
02037 C    REVISED  JUNE 12, 1996.
02038 C - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
02039 C
02040       IMPLICIT  REAL * 8  (A - H, O - Z)
02041 C
02042       DIMENSION A(80)
02043       DIMENSION P1(4),R1(4),Q1(4),S1(4),RP(4),RR(4),RQ(4),RS(4)
02044 C
02045       EQUIVALENCE (P1(1),A(65)),(R1(1),A(69)),(Q1(1),A(73)),
02046      * (S1(1),A(77))
02047 C
02048       DATA A/1.174198045,-1.463820502,4.840161537,-3.674506864,
02049      * 82.18368896,-94.94071588,-4122.331796,4670.278676,-21.54975037,
02050      * 26.72661293,-72.81365728,44.09887902,40.08073706,-51.23563510,
02051      * 1955.348537,-1940.971550,794.0496433,-982.2441344,1889.837171,
02052      * -558.9779727,-1260.543238,1260.063802,-293.5942373,344.7250789,
02053      * -773.7002492,957.0094135,-1824.143669,520.7994379,1192.484774,
02054      * -1192.184565,89.15537624,-98.52042999,-0.8168777675E-01,
02055      * 0.4255969908E-01,0.3155237661,-0.3841755213,2.494553332,
02056      * -0.6571440817E-01,-2.765661310,0.4331001908,0.1099181537,
02057      * -0.6154126980E-01,-0.3258649260,0.6698439193,-5.542735524,
02058      * 0.1604203535,5.854456934,-0.8323632049,3.732608869,-3.130002153,
02059      * 107.0972607,-32.28483411,-115.2389298,54.45064360,-0.5826853320,
02060      * -3.582482231,-4.046544561,3.311978102,-104.0839563,30.26401293,
02061      * 97.29109008,-50.62370872,-296.3734955,127.7872523,5.303648988,
02062      * 10.40368955,69.65230348,466.5099509,1.645049286,3.825838190,
02063      * 11.66675599,558.9781177,1.826531343,2.066018073,25.40971369,
02064      * 990.2795225,2.319489258,4.555148484,9.691185703,591.8280358/
02065 C
02066          BX=0.D0
02067          BY=0.D0
02068          BZ=0.D0
02069          CPS=DCOS(PS)
02070          SPS=DSIN(PS)
02071          S3PS=4.D0*CPS**2-1.D0
02072 C
02073          DO 11 I=1,4
02074           RP(I)=1.D0/P1(I)
02075           RR(I)=1.D0/R1(I)
02076           RQ(I)=1.D0/Q1(I)
02077  11       RS(I)=1.D0/S1(I)
02078 C
02079           L=0
02080 C
02081            DO 1 M=1,2     !    M=1 IS FOR THE 1ST SUM ("PERP." SYMMETRY)
02082 C                           AND M=2 IS FOR THE SECOND SUM ("PARALL." SYMMETRY)
02083              DO 2 I=1,4
02084                   CYPI=DCOS(Y*RP(I))
02085                   CYQI=DCOS(Y*RQ(I))
02086                   SYPI=DSIN(Y*RP(I))
02087                   SYQI=DSIN(Y*RQ(I))
02088 C
02089                 DO 3 K=1,4
02090                    SZRK=DSIN(Z*RR(K))
02091                    CZSK=DCOS(Z*RS(K))
02092                    CZRK=DCOS(Z*RR(K))
02093                    SZSK=DSIN(Z*RS(K))
02094                      SQPR=DSQRT(RP(I)**2+RR(K)**2)
02095                      SQQS=DSQRT(RQ(I)**2+RS(K)**2)
02096                         EPR=DEXP(X*SQPR)
02097                         EQS=DEXP(X*SQQS)
02098 C
02099                     DO 4 N=1,2  ! N=1 IS FOR THE FIRST PART OF EACH COEFFICIENT
02100 C                                  AND N=2 IS FOR THE SECOND ONE
02101                      IF (M.EQ.1) THEN
02102                        IF (N.EQ.1) THEN
02103                          HX=-SQPR*EPR*CYPI*SZRK
02104                          HY=RP(I)*EPR*SYPI*SZRK
02105                          HZ=-RR(K)*EPR*CYPI*CZRK
02106                                    ELSE
02107                          HX=HX*CPS
02108                          HY=HY*CPS
02109                          HZ=HZ*CPS
02110                                    ENDIF
02111                      ELSE
02112                        IF (N.EQ.1) THEN
02113                          HX=-SPS*SQQS*EQS*CYQI*CZSK
02114                          HY=SPS*RQ(I)*EQS*SYQI*CZSK
02115                          HZ=SPS*RS(K)*EQS*CYQI*SZSK
02116                                    ELSE
02117                          HX=HX*S3PS
02118                          HY=HY*S3PS
02119                          HZ=HZ*S3PS
02120                        ENDIF
02121                  ENDIF
02122        L=L+1
02123 C
02124        BX=BX+A(L)*HX
02125        BY=BY+A(L)*HY
02126   4    BZ=BZ+A(L)*HZ
02127   3   CONTINUE
02128   2   CONTINUE
02129   1   CONTINUE
02130 C
02131          RETURN
02132      END
02133 C
02134 C##########################################################################
02135 C
02136          SUBROUTINE BIRK2TOT_02(PS,X,Y,Z,BX,BY,BZ)
02137 C
02138           IMPLICIT REAL*8 (A-H,O-Z)
02139 C
02140           CALL BIRK2SHL(X,Y,Z,PS,WX,WY,WZ)
02141           CALL R2_BIRK(X,Y,Z,PS,HX,HY,HZ)
02142          BX=WX+HX
02143          BY=WY+HY
02144          BZ=WZ+HZ
02145          RETURN                                
02146          END
02147 C
02148 C$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$
02149 C
02150 C THIS CODE IS FOR THE FIELD FROM  2X2X2=8 "CARTESIAN" HARMONICS 
02151 C
02152          SUBROUTINE  BIRK2SHL(X,Y,Z,PS,HX,HY,HZ)
02153 C
02154 C - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
02155 C    THE MODEL PARAMETERS ARE PROVIDED TO THIS MODULE VIA COMMON-BLOCK /A/.
02156 C  THE 16 LINEAR PARAMETERS ENTER IN PAIRS IN THE AMPLITUDES OF THE 
02157 C       "CARTESIAN" HARMONICS.
02158 C    THE 8 NONLINEAR PARAMETERS ARE THE SCALES PI,RI,QI,AND SI ENTERING THE 
02159 C  ARGUMENTS OF EXPONENTS, SINES, AND COSINES IN EACH OF THE 8 "CARTESIAN" 
02160 C   HARMONICS
02161 C - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
02162 C
02163      IMPLICIT  REAL * 8  (A - H, O - Z)
02164 C
02165          DIMENSION P(2),R(2),Q(2),S(2)
02166          DIMENSION A(24)
02167 C
02168          EQUIVALENCE(P(1),A(17)),(R(1),A(19)),(Q(1),A(21)),(S(1),A(23))
02169          DATA A/-111.6371348,124.5402702,110.3735178,-122.0095905,
02170      * 111.9448247,-129.1957743,-110.7586562,126.5649012,-0.7865034384,
02171      * -0.2483462721,0.8026023894,0.2531397188,10.72890902,0.8483902118,
02172      * -10.96884315,-0.8583297219,13.85650567,14.90554500,10.21914434,
02173      * 10.09021632,6.340382460,14.40432686,12.71023437,12.83966657/
02174 C
02175             CPS=DCOS(PS)
02176             SPS=DSIN(PS)
02177             S3PS=4.D0*CPS**2-1.D0   !  THIS IS SIN(3*PS)/SIN(PS)
02178 C
02179            HX=0.D0
02180            HY=0.D0
02181            HZ=0.D0
02182            L=0
02183 C
02184            DO 1 M=1,2     !    M=1 IS FOR THE 1ST SUM ("PERP." SYMMETRY)
02185 C                           AND M=2 IS FOR THE SECOND SUM ("PARALL." SYMMETRY)
02186              DO 2 I=1,2
02187                   CYPI=DCOS(Y/P(I))
02188                   CYQI=DCOS(Y/Q(I))
02189                   SYPI=DSIN(Y/P(I))
02190                   SYQI=DSIN(Y/Q(I))
02191 C
02192                DO 3 K=1,2
02193                    SZRK=DSIN(Z/R(K))
02194                    CZSK=DCOS(Z/S(K))
02195                    CZRK=DCOS(Z/R(K))
02196                    SZSK=DSIN(Z/S(K))
02197                      SQPR=DSQRT(1.D0/P(I)**2+1.D0/R(K)**2)
02198                      SQQS=DSQRT(1.D0/Q(I)**2+1.D0/S(K)**2)
02199                         EPR=DEXP(X*SQPR)
02200                         EQS=DEXP(X*SQQS)
02201 C
02202                    DO 4 N=1,2  ! N=1 IS FOR THE FIRST PART OF EACH COEFFICIENT
02203 C                                  AND N=2 IS FOR THE SECOND ONE
02204 C
02205                     L=L+1
02206                      IF (M.EQ.1) THEN
02207                        IF (N.EQ.1) THEN
02208                          DX=-SQPR*EPR*CYPI*SZRK
02209                          DY=EPR/P(I)*SYPI*SZRK
02210                          DZ=-EPR/R(K)*CYPI*CZRK
02211                          HX=HX+A(L)*DX
02212                          HY=HY+A(L)*DY
02213                          HZ=HZ+A(L)*DZ
02214                                    ELSE
02215                          DX=DX*CPS
02216                          DY=DY*CPS
02217                          DZ=DZ*CPS
02218                          HX=HX+A(L)*DX
02219                          HY=HY+A(L)*DY
02220                          HZ=HZ+A(L)*DZ
02221                                    ENDIF
02222                      ELSE
02223                        IF (N.EQ.1) THEN
02224                          DX=-SPS*SQQS*EQS*CYQI*CZSK
02225                          DY=SPS*EQS/Q(I)*SYQI*CZSK
02226                          DZ=SPS*EQS/S(K)*CYQI*SZSK
02227                          HX=HX+A(L)*DX
02228                          HY=HY+A(L)*DY
02229                          HZ=HZ+A(L)*DZ
02230                                    ELSE
02231                          DX=DX*S3PS
02232                          DY=DY*S3PS
02233                          DZ=DZ*S3PS
02234                          HX=HX+A(L)*DX
02235                          HY=HY+A(L)*DY
02236                          HZ=HZ+A(L)*DZ
02237                        ENDIF
02238                  ENDIF
02239 C
02240   4   CONTINUE
02241   3   CONTINUE
02242   2   CONTINUE
02243   1   CONTINUE
02244 C
02245          RETURN
02246      END
02247 
02248 C********************************************************************
02249 C
02250        SUBROUTINE R2_BIRK(X,Y,Z,PS,BX,BY,BZ)
02251 C
02252 C  RETURNS THE MODEL FIELD FOR THE REGION 2 BIRKELAND CURRENT/PARTIAL RC
02253 C    (WITHOUT SHIELDING FIELD)
02254 C
02255        IMPLICIT REAL*8 (A-H,O-Z)
02256        SAVE PSI,CPS,SPS
02257        DATA DELARG/0.030D0/,DELARG1/0.015D0/,PSI/10.D0/
02258 C
02259        IF (DABS(PSI-PS).GT.1.D-10) THEN
02260          PSI=PS
02261          CPS=DCOS(PS)
02262          SPS=DSIN(PS)
02263        ENDIF
02264 C
02265        XSM=X*CPS-Z*SPS
02266        ZSM=Z*CPS+X*SPS
02267 C
02268        XKS=XKSI(XSM,Y,ZSM)
02269       IF (XKS.LT.-(DELARG+DELARG1)) THEN
02270         CALL R2OUTER(XSM,Y,ZSM,BXSM,BY,BZSM)
02271          BXSM=-BXSM*0.02      !  ALL COMPONENTS ARE MULTIPLIED BY THE
02272      BY=-BY*0.02          !  FACTOR -0.02, IN ORDER TO NORMALIZE THE
02273          BZSM=-BZSM*0.02      !  FIELD (SO THAT BZ=-1 NT AT X=-5.3 RE, Y=Z=0)
02274       ENDIF
02275       IF (XKS.GE.-(DELARG+DELARG1).AND.XKS.LT.-DELARG+DELARG1) THEN
02276         CALL R2OUTER(XSM,Y,ZSM,BXSM1,BY1,BZSM1)
02277         CALL R2SHEET(XSM,Y,ZSM,BXSM2,BY2,BZSM2)
02278         F2=-0.02*TKSI(XKS,-DELARG,DELARG1)                                 
02279         F1=-0.02-F2                                                     
02280         BXSM=BXSM1*F1+BXSM2*F2                                                )
02281         BY=BY1*F1+BY2*F2
02282         BZSM=BZSM1*F1+BZSM2*F2
02283       ENDIF
02284 
02285       IF (XKS.GE.-DELARG+DELARG1.AND.XKS.LT.DELARG-DELARG1) THEN
02286        CALL R2SHEET(XSM,Y,ZSM,BXSM,BY,BZSM)
02287          BXSM=-BXSM*0.02
02288          BY=-BY*0.02
02289          BZSM=-BZSM*0.02
02290       ENDIF
02291       IF (XKS.GE.DELARG-DELARG1.AND.XKS.LT.DELARG+DELARG1) THEN
02292         CALL R2INNER(XSM,Y,ZSM,BXSM1,BY1,BZSM1)
02293         CALL R2SHEET(XSM,Y,ZSM,BXSM2,BY2,BZSM2)
02294         F1=-0.02*TKSI(XKS,DELARG,DELARG1)
02295         F2=-0.02-F1
02296         BXSM=BXSM1*F1+BXSM2*F2
02297         BY=BY1*F1+BY2*F2
02298         BZSM=BZSM1*F1+BZSM2*F2
02299       ENDIF
02300       IF (XKS.GE.DELARG+DELARG1) THEN
02301          CALL R2INNER(XSM,Y,ZSM,BXSM,BY,BZSM)
02302          BXSM=-BXSM*0.02
02303          BY=-BY*0.02
02304          BZSM=-BZSM*0.02
02305       ENDIF
02306 C
02307         BX=BXSM*CPS+BZSM*SPS
02308         BZ=BZSM*CPS-BXSM*SPS
02309 C
02310         RETURN
02311         END
02312 C
02313 C****************************************************************
02314 
02315 C
02316       SUBROUTINE R2INNER (X,Y,Z,BX,BY,BZ)
02317 C
02318 C
02319       IMPLICIT REAL*8 (A-H,O-Z)
02320       DIMENSION CBX(5),CBY(5),CBZ(5)
02321 C
02322       DATA PL1,PL2,PL3,PL4,PL5,PL6,PL7,PL8/154.185,-2.12446,.601735E-01,
02323      * -.153954E-02,.355077E-04,29.9996,262.886,99.9132/
02324       DATA PN1,PN2,PN3,PN4,PN5,PN6,PN7,PN8/-8.1902,6.5239,5.504,7.7815,
02325      * .8573,3.0986,.0774,-.038/
02326 C
02327       CALL BCONIC(X,Y,Z,CBX,CBY,CBZ,5)
02328 C
02329 C   NOW INTRODUCE  ONE  4-LOOP SYSTEM:
02330 C
02331        CALL LOOPS4(X,Y,Z,DBX8,DBY8,DBZ8,PN1,PN2,PN3,PN4,PN5,PN6)
02332 C
02333        CALL DIPDISTR(X-PN7,Y,Z,DBX6,DBY6,DBZ6,0)
02334        CALL DIPDISTR(X-PN8,Y,Z,DBX7,DBY7,DBZ7,1)
02335 
02336 C                           NOW COMPUTE THE FIELD COMPONENTS:
02337 
02338       BX=PL1*CBX(1)+PL2*CBX(2)+PL3*CBX(3)+PL4*CBX(4)+PL5*CBX(5)
02339      * +PL6*DBX6+PL7*DBX7+PL8*DBX8
02340       BY=PL1*CBY(1)+PL2*CBY(2)+PL3*CBY(3)+PL4*CBY(4)+PL5*CBY(5)
02341      * +PL6*DBY6+PL7*DBY7+PL8*DBY8
02342       BZ=PL1*CBZ(1)+PL2*CBZ(2)+PL3*CBZ(3)+PL4*CBZ(4)+PL5*CBZ(5)
02343      * +PL6*DBZ6+PL7*DBZ7+PL8*DBZ8
02344 C
02345       RETURN
02346       END
02347 C-----------------------------------------------------------------------
02348 
02349       SUBROUTINE BCONIC(X,Y,Z,CBX,CBY,CBZ,NMAX)
02350 C
02351 C   "CONICAL" HARMONICS
02352 C
02353        IMPLICIT REAL*8 (A-H,O-Z)
02354 C
02355        DIMENSION CBX(NMAX),CBY(NMAX),CBZ(NMAX)
02356 
02357        RO2=X**2+Y**2
02358        RO=SQRT(RO2)
02359 C
02360        CF=X/RO
02361        SF=Y/RO
02362        CFM1=1.D0
02363        SFM1=0.D0
02364 C
02365       R2=RO2+Z**2
02366       R=DSQRT(R2)
02367       C=Z/R
02368       S=RO/R
02369       CH=DSQRT(0.5D0*(1.D0+C))
02370       SH=DSQRT(0.5D0*(1.D0-C))
02371       TNHM1=1.D0
02372       CNHM1=1.D0
02373       TNH=SH/CH
02374       CNH=1.D0/TNH
02375 C
02376       DO 1 M=1,NMAX
02377         CFM=CFM1*CF-SFM1*SF
02378         SFM=CFM1*SF+SFM1*CF
02379         CFM1=CFM
02380         SFM1=SFM
02381         TNHM=TNHM1*TNH
02382         CNHM=CNHM1*CNH
02383        BT=M*CFM/(R*S)*(TNHM+CNHM)
02384        BF=-0.5D0*M*SFM/R*(TNHM1/CH**2-CNHM1/SH**2)
02385          TNHM1=TNHM
02386          CNHM1=CNHM
02387        CBX(M)=BT*C*CF-BF*SF
02388        CBY(M)=BT*C*SF+BF*CF
02389   1    CBZ(M)=-BT*S
02390 C
02391        RETURN
02392        END
02393 
02394 C&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&
02395 C
02396        SUBROUTINE DIPDISTR(X,Y,Z,BX,BY,BZ,MODE)
02397 C
02398 C   RETURNS FIELD COMPONENTS FROM A LINEAR DISTRIBUTION OF DIPOLAR SOURCES
02399 C     ON THE Z-AXIS.  THE PARAMETER MODE DEFINES HOW THE DIPOLE STRENGTH
02400 C       VARIES ALONG THE Z-AXIS:  MODE=0 IS FOR A STEP-FUNCTION (MX=CONST>0
02401 C         FOR Z>0, AND MX=-CONST<0 FOR Z<0)
02402 C      WHILE MODE=1 IS FOR A LINEAR VARIATION OF THE DIPOLE MOMENT DENSITY
02403 C       SEE NB#3, PAGE 53 FOR DETAILS.
02404 C
02405 C
02406 C INPUT: X,Y,Z OF A POINT OF SPACE, AND MODE
02407 C
02408         IMPLICIT REAL*8 (A-H,O-Z)
02409         X2=X*X
02410         RHO2=X2+Y*Y
02411         R2=RHO2+Z*Z
02412         R3=R2*DSQRT(R2)
02413 
02414         IF (MODE.EQ.0) THEN
02415          BX=Z/RHO2**2*(R2*(Y*Y-X2)-RHO2*X2)/R3
02416          BY=-X*Y*Z/RHO2**2*(2.D0*R2+RHO2)/R3
02417          BZ=X/R3
02418         ELSE
02419          BX=Z/RHO2**2*(Y*Y-X2)
02420          BY=-2.D0*X*Y*Z/RHO2**2
02421          BZ=X/RHO2
02422         ENDIF
02423          RETURN
02424          END
02425 
02426 C+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
02427 C
02428       SUBROUTINE R2OUTER (X,Y,Z,BX,BY,BZ)
02429 C
02430       IMPLICIT REAL*8 (A-H,O-Z)
02431 C
02432       DATA PL1,PL2,PL3,PL4,PL5/-34.105,-2.00019,628.639,73.4847,12.5162/
02433       DATA PN1,PN2,PN3,PN4,PN5,PN6,PN7,PN8,PN9,PN10,PN11,PN12,PN13,PN14,
02434      *  PN15,PN16,PN17 /.55,.694,.0031,1.55,2.8,.1375,-.7,.2,.9625,
02435      * -2.994,2.925,-1.775,4.3,-.275,2.7,.4312,1.55/
02436 C
02437 C    THREE PAIRS OF CROSSED LOOPS:
02438 C
02439       CALL CROSSLP(X,Y,Z,DBX1,DBY1,DBZ1,PN1,PN2,PN3)
02440       CALL CROSSLP(X,Y,Z,DBX2,DBY2,DBZ2,PN4,PN5,PN6)
02441       CALL CROSSLP(X,Y,Z,DBX3,DBY3,DBZ3,PN7,PN8,PN9)
02442 C
02443 C    NOW AN EQUATORIAL LOOP ON THE NIGHTSIDE
02444 C
02445       CALL CIRCLE(X-PN10,Y,Z,PN11,DBX4,DBY4,DBZ4)
02446 C
02447 C   NOW A 4-LOOP SYSTEM ON THE NIGHTSIDE
02448 C
02449 
02450       CALL LOOPS4(X,Y,Z,DBX5,DBY5,DBZ5,PN12,PN13,PN14,PN15,PN16,PN17)
02451 
02452 C---------------------------------------------------------------------
02453 
02454 C                           NOW COMPUTE THE FIELD COMPONENTS:
02455 
02456       BX=PL1*DBX1+PL2*DBX2+PL3*DBX3+PL4*DBX4+PL5*DBX5
02457       BY=PL1*DBY1+PL2*DBY2+PL3*DBY3+PL4*DBY4+PL5*DBY5
02458       BZ=PL1*DBZ1+PL2*DBZ2+PL3*DBZ3+PL4*DBZ4+PL5*DBZ5
02459 
02460        RETURN
02461        END
02462 C
02463 C--------------------------------------------------------------------
02464 C
02465        SUBROUTINE LOOPS4(X,Y,Z,BX,BY,BZ,XC,YC,ZC,R,THETA,PHI)
02466 C
02467 C   RETURNS FIELD COMPONENTS FROM A SYSTEM OF 4 CURRENT LOOPS, POSITIONED 
02468 C     SYMMETRICALLY WITH RESPECT TO NOON-MIDNIGHT MERIDIAN AND EQUATORIAL
02469 C      PLANES.   
02470 C  INPUT: X,Y,Z OF A POINT OF SPACE
02471 C        XC,YC,ZC (YC>0 AND ZC>0) - POSITION OF THE CENTER OF THE 
02472 C                                         1ST-QUADRANT LOOP 
02473 C        R - LOOP RADIUS (THE SAME FOR ALL FOUR)
02474 C        THETA, PHI  -  SPECIFY THE ORIENTATION OF THE NORMAL OF THE 1ST LOOP
02475 C      -----------------------------------------------------------
02476 
02477         IMPLICIT REAL*8 (A-H,O-Z)
02478 C
02479           CT=DCOS(THETA)
02480           ST=DSIN(THETA)
02481           CP=DCOS(PHI)
02482           SP=DSIN(PHI)
02483 C------------------------------------1ST QUADRANT:
02484         XS=(X-XC)*CP+(Y-YC)*SP
02485         YSS=(Y-YC)*CP-(X-XC)*SP
02486         ZS=Z-ZC
02487         XSS=XS*CT-ZS*ST
02488         ZSS=ZS*CT+XS*ST
02489  
02490         CALL CIRCLE(XSS,YSS,ZSS,R,BXSS,BYS,BZSS)
02491           BXS=BXSS*CT+BZSS*ST
02492           BZ1=BZSS*CT-BXSS*ST
02493           BX1=BXS*CP-BYS*SP
02494           BY1=BXS*SP+BYS*CP
02495 C-------------------------------------2ND QUADRANT:
02496         XS=(X-XC)*CP-(Y+YC)*SP
02497         YSS=(Y+YC)*CP+(X-XC)*SP
02498         ZS=Z-ZC
02499         XSS=XS*CT-ZS*ST
02500         ZSS=ZS*CT+XS*ST
02501  
02502         CALL CIRCLE(XSS,YSS,ZSS,R,BXSS,BYS,BZSS)
02503           BXS=BXSS*CT+BZSS*ST
02504           BZ2=BZSS*CT-BXSS*ST
02505           BX2=BXS*CP+BYS*SP
02506           BY2=-BXS*SP+BYS*CP
02507 C-------------------------------------3RD QUADRANT:
02508         XS=-(X-XC)*CP+(Y+YC)*SP 
02509         YSS=-(Y+YC)*CP-(X-XC)*SP
02510         ZS=Z+ZC
02511         XSS=XS*CT-ZS*ST
02512         ZSS=ZS*CT+XS*ST
02513  
02514         CALL CIRCLE(XSS,YSS,ZSS,R,BXSS,BYS,BZSS)
02515           BXS=BXSS*CT+BZSS*ST
02516           BZ3=BZSS*CT-BXSS*ST
02517           BX3=-BXS*CP-BYS*SP
02518           BY3=BXS*SP-BYS*CP
02519 C-------------------------------------4TH QUADRANT:
02520         XS=-(X-XC)*CP-(Y-YC)*SP
02521         YSS=-(Y-YC)*CP+(X-XC)*SP
02522         ZS=Z+ZC
02523         XSS=XS*CT-ZS*ST
02524         ZSS=ZS*CT+XS*ST
02525  
02526         CALL CIRCLE(XSS,YSS,ZSS,R,BXSS,BYS,BZSS)
02527           BXS=BXSS*CT+BZSS*ST
02528           BZ4=BZSS*CT-BXSS*ST
02529           BX4=-BXS*CP+BYS*SP
02530           BY4=-BXS*SP-BYS*CP
02531  
02532         BX=BX1+BX2+BX3+BX4
02533         BY=BY1+BY2+BY3+BY4
02534         BZ=BZ1+BZ2+BZ3+BZ4
02535  
02536          RETURN
02537          END
02538 C      
02539 C@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@
02540 C
02541       SUBROUTINE R2SHEET(X,Y,Z,BX,BY,BZ)
02542 C
02543       IMPLICIT REAL*8 (A-H,O-Z)
02544 C
02545       DATA PNONX1,PNONX2,PNONX3,PNONX4,PNONX5,PNONX6,PNONX7,PNONX8,
02546      *     PNONY1,PNONY2,PNONY3,PNONY4,PNONY5,PNONY6,PNONY7,PNONY8,
02547      *     PNONZ1,PNONZ2,PNONZ3,PNONZ4,PNONZ5,PNONZ6,PNONZ7,PNONZ8
02548      */-19.0969D0,-9.28828D0,-0.129687D0,5.58594D0,22.5055D0,
02549      *  0.483750D-01,0.396953D-01,0.579023D-01,-13.6750D0,-6.70625D0,
02550      *  2.31875D0,11.4062D0,20.4562D0,0.478750D-01,0.363750D-01,
02551      * 0.567500D-01,-16.7125D0,-16.4625D0,-0.1625D0,5.1D0,23.7125D0,
02552      * 0.355625D-01,0.318750D-01,0.538750D-01/
02553 C
02554 C
02555       DATA A1,A2,A3,A4,A5,A6,A7,A8,A9,A10,A11,A12,A13,A14,A15,A16,A17,
02556      *  A18,A19,A20,A21,A22,A23,A24,A25,A26,A27,A28,A29,A30,A31,A32,A33,
02557      *  A34,A35,A36,A37,A38,A39,A40,A41,A42,A43,A44,A45,A46,A47,A48,A49,
02558      *  A50,A51,A52,A53,A54,A55,A56,A57,A58,A59,A60,A61,A62,A63,A64,A65,
02559      *  A66,A67,A68,A69,A70,A71,A72,A73,A74,A75,A76,A77,A78,A79,A80
02560      * /8.07190D0,-7.39582D0,-7.62341D0,0.684671D0,-13.5672D0,11.6681D0,
02561      * 13.1154,-0.890217D0,7.78726D0,-5.38346D0,-8.08738D0,0.609385D0,
02562      * -2.70410D0, 3.53741D0,3.15549D0,-1.11069D0,-8.47555D0,0.278122D0,
02563      *  2.73514D0,4.55625D0,13.1134D0,1.15848D0,-3.52648D0,-8.24698D0,
02564      * -6.85710D0,-2.81369D0, 2.03795D0, 4.64383D0,2.49309D0,-1.22041D0,
02565      * -1.67432D0,-0.422526D0,-5.39796D0,7.10326D0,5.53730D0,-13.1918D0,
02566      *  4.67853D0,-7.60329D0,-2.53066D0, 7.76338D0, 5.60165D0,5.34816D0,
02567      * -4.56441D0,7.05976D0,-2.62723D0,-0.529078D0,1.42019D0,-2.93919D0,
02568      *  55.6338D0,-1.55181D0,39.8311D0,-80.6561D0,-46.9655D0,32.8925D0,
02569      * -6.32296D0,19.7841D0,124.731D0,10.4347D0,-30.7581D0,102.680D0,
02570      * -47.4037D0,-3.31278D0,9.37141D0,-50.0268D0,-533.319D0,110.426D0,
02571      *  1000.20D0,-1051.40D0, 1619.48D0,589.855D0,-1462.73D0,1087.10D0,
02572      *  -1994.73D0,-1654.12D0,1263.33D0,-260.210D0,1424.84D0,1255.71D0,
02573      *  -956.733D0, 219.946D0/
02574 C
02575 C
02576       DATA B1,B2,B3,B4,B5,B6,B7,B8,B9,B10,B11,B12,B13,B14,B15,B16,B17,
02577      *  B18,B19,B20,B21,B22,B23,B24,B25,B26,B27,B28,B29,B30,B31,B32,B33,
02578      *  B34,B35,B36,B37,B38,B39,B40,B41,B42,B43,B44,B45,B46,B47,B48,B49,
02579      *  B50,B51,B52,B53,B54,B55,B56,B57,B58,B59,B60,B61,B62,B63,B64,B65,
02580      *  B66,B67,B68,B69,B70,B71,B72,B73,B74,B75,B76,B77,B78,B79,B80
02581      */-9.08427D0,10.6777D0,10.3288D0,-0.969987D0,6.45257D0,-8.42508D0,
02582      * -7.97464D0,1.41996D0,-1.92490D0,3.93575D0,2.83283D0,-1.48621D0,
02583      *0.244033D0,-0.757941D0,-0.386557D0,0.344566D0,9.56674D0,-2.5365D0,
02584      * -3.32916D0,-5.86712D0,-6.19625D0,1.83879D0,2.52772D0,4.34417D0,
02585      * 1.87268D0,-2.13213D0,-1.69134D0,-.176379D0,-.261359D0,.566419D0,
02586      * 0.3138D0,-0.134699D0,-3.83086D0,-8.4154D0,4.77005D0,-9.31479D0,
02587      * 37.5715D0,19.3992D0,-17.9582D0,36.4604D0,-14.9993D0,-3.1442D0, 
02588      * 6.17409D0,-15.5519D0,2.28621D0,-0.891549D-2,-.462912D0,2.47314D0,
02589      * 41.7555D0,208.614D0,-45.7861D0,-77.8687D0,239.357D0,-67.9226D0,
02590      * 66.8743D0,238.534D0,-112.136D0,16.2069D0,-40.4706D0,-134.328D0,
02591      * 21.56D0,-0.201725D0,2.21D0,32.5855D0,-108.217D0,-1005.98D0,
02592      * 585.753D0,323.668D0,-817.056D0,235.750D0,-560.965D0,-576.892D0,
02593      * 684.193D0,85.0275D0,168.394D0,477.776D0,-289.253D0,-123.216D0,
02594      * 75.6501D0,-178.605D0/
02595 C
02596       DATA C1,C2,C3,C4,C5,C6,C7,C8,C9,C10,C11,C12,C13,C14,C15,C16,C17,
02597      *  C18,C19,C20,C21,C22,C23,C24,C25,C26,C27,C28,C29,C30,C31,C32,C33,
02598      *  C34,C35,C36,C37,C38,C39,C40,C41,C42,C43,C44,C45,C46,C47,C48,C49,
02599      *  C50,C51,C52,C53,C54,C55,C56,C57,C58,C59,C60,C61,C62,C63,C64,C65,
02600      *  C66,C67,C68,C69,C70,C71,C72,C73,C74,C75,C76,C77,C78,C79,C80
02601      * / 1167.61D0,-917.782D0,-1253.2D0,-274.128D0,-1538.75D0,1257.62D0,
02602      * 1745.07D0,113.479D0,393.326D0,-426.858D0,-641.1D0,190.833D0,
02603      * -29.9435D0,-1.04881D0,117.125D0,-25.7663D0,-1168.16D0,910.247D0,
02604      * 1239.31D0,289.515D0,1540.56D0,-1248.29D0,-1727.61D0,-131.785D0,
02605      * -394.577D0,426.163D0,637.422D0,-187.965D0,30.0348D0,0.221898D0,
02606      * -116.68D0,26.0291D0,12.6804D0,4.84091D0,1.18166D0,-2.75946D0,
02607      * -17.9822D0,-6.80357D0,-1.47134D0,3.02266D0,4.79648D0,0.665255D0,
02608      * -0.256229D0,-0.857282D-1,-0.588997D0,0.634812D-1,0.164303D0,
02609      * -0.15285D0,22.2524D0,-22.4376D0,-3.85595D0,6.07625D0,-105.959D0,
02610      * -41.6698D0,0.378615D0,1.55958D0,44.3981D0,18.8521D0,3.19466D0,
02611      *  5.89142D0,-8.63227D0,-2.36418D0,-1.027D0,-2.31515D0,1035.38D0,
02612      *  2040.66D0,-131.881D0,-744.533D0,-3274.93D0,-4845.61D0,482.438D0,
02613      * 1567.43D0,1354.02D0,2040.47D0,-151.653D0,-845.012D0,-111.723D0,
02614      * -265.343D0,-26.1171D0,216.632D0/
02615 C
02616 C------------------------------------------------------------------
02617 C
02618        XKS=XKSI(X,Y,Z)    !  VARIATION ACROSS THE CURRENT SHEET
02619        T1X=XKS/DSQRT(XKS**2+PNONX6**2)
02620        T2X=PNONX7**3/DSQRT(XKS**2+PNONX7**2)**3
02621        T3X=XKS/DSQRT(XKS**2+PNONX8**2)**5 *3.493856D0*PNONX8**4
02622 C
02623        T1Y=XKS/DSQRT(XKS**2+PNONY6**2)
02624        T2Y=PNONY7**3/DSQRT(XKS**2+PNONY7**2)**3
02625        T3Y=XKS/DSQRT(XKS**2+PNONY8**2)**5 *3.493856D0*PNONY8**4
02626 C
02627        T1Z=XKS/DSQRT(XKS**2+PNONZ6**2)
02628        T2Z=PNONZ7**3/DSQRT(XKS**2+PNONZ7**2)**3
02629        T3Z=XKS/DSQRT(XKS**2+PNONZ8**2)**5 *3.493856D0*PNONZ8**4
02630 C
02631       RHO2=X*X+Y*Y
02632       R=DSQRT(RHO2+Z*Z)
02633       RHO=DSQRT(RHO2)
02634 C
02635       C1P=X/RHO
02636       S1P=Y/RHO
02637       S2P=2.D0*S1P*C1P
02638       C2P=C1P*C1P-S1P*S1P
02639       S3P=S2P*C1P+C2P*S1P
02640       C3P=C2P*C1P-S2P*S1P
02641       S4P=S3P*C1P+C3P*S1P
02642       CT=Z/R
02643       ST=RHO/R
02644 C
02645       S1=FEXP(CT,PNONX1)
02646       S2=FEXP(CT,PNONX2)
02647       S3=FEXP(CT,PNONX3)
02648       S4=FEXP(CT,PNONX4)
02649       S5=FEXP(CT,PNONX5)
02650 C
02651 C                   NOW COMPUTE THE GSM FIELD COMPONENTS:
02652 C
02653 C
02654       BX=S1*((A1+A2*T1X+A3*T2X+A4*T3X)
02655      *        +C1P*(A5+A6*T1X+A7*T2X+A8*T3X)
02656      *        +C2P*(A9+A10*T1X+A11*T2X+A12*T3X)
02657      *        +C3P*(A13+A14*T1X+A15*T2X+A16*T3X))
02658      *    +S2*((A17+A18*T1X+A19*T2X+A20*T3X)
02659      *        +C1P*(A21+A22*T1X+A23*T2X+A24*T3X)
02660      *        +C2P*(A25+A26*T1X+A27*T2X+A28*T3X)
02661      *        +C3P*(A29+A30*T1X+A31*T2X+A32*T3X))
02662      *    +S3*((A33+A34*T1X+A35*T2X+A36*T3X)
02663      *        +C1P*(A37+A38*T1X+A39*T2X+A40*T3X)
02664      *        +C2P*(A41+A42*T1X+A43*T2X+A44*T3X)
02665      *        +C3P*(A45+A46*T1X+A47*T2X+A48*T3X))
02666      *    +S4*((A49+A50*T1X+A51*T2X+A52*T3X)
02667      *        +C1P*(A53+A54*T1X+A55*T2X+A56*T3X)
02668      *        +C2P*(A57+A58*T1X+A59*T2X+A60*T3X)
02669      *        +C3P*(A61+A62*T1X+A63*T2X+A64*T3X))
02670      *    +S5*((A65+A66*T1X+A67*T2X+A68*T3X)
02671      *        +C1P*(A69+A70*T1X+A71*T2X+A72*T3X)
02672      *        +C2P*(A73+A74*T1X+A75*T2X+A76*T3X)
02673      *        +C3P*(A77+A78*T1X+A79*T2X+A80*T3X))
02674 C
02675 C
02676       S1=FEXP(CT,PNONY1)
02677       S2=FEXP(CT,PNONY2)
02678       S3=FEXP(CT,PNONY3)
02679       S4=FEXP(CT,PNONY4)
02680       S5=FEXP(CT,PNONY5)
02681 C
02682       BY=S1*(S1P*(B1+B2*T1Y+B3*T2Y+B4*T3Y)
02683      *      +S2P*(B5+B6*T1Y+B7*T2Y+B8*T3Y)
02684      *      +S3P*(B9+B10*T1Y+B11*T2Y+B12*T3Y)
02685      *      +S4P*(B13+B14*T1Y+B15*T2Y+B16*T3Y))
02686      *  +S2*(S1P*(B17+B18*T1Y+B19*T2Y+B20*T3Y)
02687      *      +S2P*(B21+B22*T1Y+B23*T2Y+B24*T3Y)
02688      *      +S3P*(B25+B26*T1Y+B27*T2Y+B28*T3Y)
02689      *      +S4P*(B29+B30*T1Y+B31*T2Y+B32*T3Y))
02690      *  +S3*(S1P*(B33+B34*T1Y+B35*T2Y+B36*T3Y)
02691      *      +S2P*(B37+B38*T1Y+B39*T2Y+B40*T3Y)
02692      *      +S3P*(B41+B42*T1Y+B43*T2Y+B44*T3Y)
02693      *      +S4P*(B45+B46*T1Y+B47*T2Y+B48*T3Y))
02694      *  +S4*(S1P*(B49+B50*T1Y+B51*T2Y+B52*T3Y)
02695      *      +S2P*(B53+B54*T1Y+B55*T2Y+B56*T3Y)
02696      *      +S3P*(B57+B58*T1Y+B59*T2Y+B60*T3Y)
02697      *      +S4P*(B61+B62*T1Y+B63*T2Y+B64*T3Y))
02698      *  +S5*(S1P*(B65+B66*T1Y+B67*T2Y+B68*T3Y)
02699      *      +S2P*(B69+B70*T1Y+B71*T2Y+B72*T3Y)
02700      *      +S3P*(B73+B74*T1Y+B75*T2Y+B76*T3Y)
02701      *      +S4P*(B77+B78*T1Y+B79*T2Y+B80*T3Y))
02702 C
02703       S1=FEXP1(CT,PNONZ1)
02704       S2=FEXP1(CT,PNONZ2)
02705       S3=FEXP1(CT,PNONZ3)
02706       S4=FEXP1(CT,PNONZ4)
02707       S5=FEXP1(CT,PNONZ5)
02708 C
02709       BZ=S1*((C1+C2*T1Z+C3*T2Z+C4*T3Z)
02710      *      +C1P*(C5+C6*T1Z+C7*T2Z+C8*T3Z)
02711      *      +C2P*(C9+C10*T1Z+C11*T2Z+C12*T3Z)
02712      *      +C3P*(C13+C14*T1Z+C15*T2Z+C16*T3Z))
02713      *   +S2*((C17+C18*T1Z+C19*T2Z+C20*T3Z)
02714      *      +C1P*(C21+C22*T1Z+C23*T2Z+C24*T3Z)
02715      *      +C2P*(C25+C26*T1Z+C27*T2Z+C28*T3Z)
02716      *      +C3P*(C29+C30*T1Z+C31*T2Z+C32*T3Z))
02717      *   +S3*((C33+C34*T1Z+C35*T2Z+C36*T3Z)
02718      *      +C1P*(C37+C38*T1Z+C39*T2Z+C40*T3Z)
02719      *      +C2P*(C41+C42*T1Z+C43*T2Z+C44*T3Z)
02720      *      +C3P*(C45+C46*T1Z+C47*T2Z+C48*T3Z))
02721      *   +S4*((C49+C50*T1Z+C51*T2Z+C52*T3Z)
02722      *      +C1P*(C53+C54*T1Z+C55*T2Z+C56*T3Z)
02723      *      +C2P*(C57+C58*T1Z+C59*T2Z+C60*T3Z)
02724      *      +C3P*(C61+C62*T1Z+C63*T2Z+C64*T3Z))
02725      *   +S5*((C65+C66*T1Z+C67*T2Z+C68*T3Z)
02726      *      +C1P*(C69+C70*T1Z+C71*T2Z+C72*T3Z)
02727      *      +C2P*(C73+C74*T1Z+C75*T2Z+C76*T3Z)
02728      *      +C3P*(C77+C78*T1Z+C79*T2Z+C80*T3Z))
02729 C
02730        RETURN
02731        END
02732 C
02733 C^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
02734 
02735       DOUBLE PRECISION FUNCTION XKSI(X,Y,Z)
02736 C
02737       IMPLICIT REAL*8 (A-H,O-Z)
02738 C
02739 C   A11 - C72, R0, AND DR BELOW  ARE STRETCH PARAMETERS (P.26-27, NB# 3),
02740 C
02741       DATA A11A12,A21A22,A41A42,A51A52,A61A62,B11B12,B21B22,C61C62,
02742      *  C71C72,R0,DR /0.305662,-0.383593,0.2677733,-0.097656,-0.636034,
02743      *  -0.359862,0.424706,-0.126366,0.292578,1.21563,7.50937/
02744 
02745       DATA TNOON,DTETA/0.3665191,0.09599309/ ! CORRESPOND TO NOON AND MIDNIGHT
02746 C                                         LATITUDES 69 AND 63.5 DEGS, RESP.
02747        DR2=DR*DR
02748 C
02749        X2=X*X
02750        Y2=Y*Y
02751        Z2=Z*Z
02752        XY=X*Y
02753        XYZ=XY*Z
02754        R2=X2+Y2+Z2
02755        R=DSQRT(R2)
02756        R3=R2*R
02757        R4=R2*R2
02758        XR=X/R
02759        YR=Y/R
02760        ZR=Z/R
02761 C
02762        IF (R.LT.R0) THEN
02763          PR=0.D0
02764        ELSE
02765          PR=DSQRT((R-R0)**2+DR2)-DR
02766        ENDIF
02767 C
02768       F=X+PR*(A11A12+A21A22*XR+A41A42*XR*XR+A51A52*YR*YR+
02769      *        A61A62*ZR*ZR)
02770       G=Y+PR*(B11B12*YR+B21B22*XR*YR)
02771       H=Z+PR*(C61C62*ZR+C71C72*XR*ZR)
02772       G2=G*G
02773 C
02774       FGH=F**2+G2+H**2
02775       FGH32=DSQRT(FGH)**3
02776       FCHSG2=F**2+G2
02777       SQFCHSG2=DSQRT(FCHSG2)
02778       ALPHA=FCHSG2/FGH32
02779       THETA=TNOON+0.5D0*DTETA*(1.D0-F/SQFCHSG2)
02780       PHI=DSIN(THETA)**2
02781 C
02782       XKSI=ALPHA-PHI
02783 C
02784       RETURN
02785       END
02786 C
02787 C--------------------------------------------------------------------
02788 C
02789         FUNCTION FEXP(S,A)
02790          IMPLICIT REAL*8 (A-H,O-Z)
02791           DATA E/2.718281828459D0/
02792           IF (A.LT.0.D0) FEXP=DSQRT(-2.D0*A*E)*S*DEXP(A*S*S)
02793           IF (A.GE.0.D0) FEXP=S*DEXP(A*(S*S-1.D0))
02794          RETURN
02795          END
02796 C
02797 C-----------------------------------------------------------------------
02798         FUNCTION FEXP1(S,A)
02799          IMPLICIT REAL*8 (A-H,O-Z)
02800          IF (A.LE.0.D0) FEXP1=DEXP(A*S*S)
02801          IF (A.GT.0.D0) FEXP1=DEXP(A*(S*S-1.D0))
02802          RETURN
02803          END
02804 C
02805 C************************************************************************
02806 C
02807          DOUBLE PRECISION FUNCTION TKSI(XKSI,XKS0,DXKSI)
02808          IMPLICIT REAL*8 (A-H,O-Z)
02809          SAVE M,TDZ3
02810          DATA M/0/
02811 C
02812          IF (M.EQ.0) THEN
02813          TDZ3=2.*DXKSI**3
02814          M=1
02815          ENDIF
02816 C
02817          IF (XKSI-XKS0.LT.-DXKSI) TKSII=0.
02818          IF (XKSI-XKS0.GE.DXKSI)  TKSII=1.
02819 C
02820          IF (XKSI.GE.XKS0-DXKSI.AND.XKSI.LT.XKS0) THEN
02821            BR3=(XKSI-XKS0+DXKSI)**3
02822            TKSII=1.5*BR3/(TDZ3+BR3)
02823          ENDIF
02824 C
02825          IF (XKSI.GE.XKS0.AND.XKSI.LT.XKS0+DXKSI) THEN
02826            BR3=(XKSI-XKS0-DXKSI)**3
02827            TKSII=1.+1.5*BR3/(TDZ3-BR3)
02828          ENDIF
02829            TKSI=TKSII
02830          END
02831 C
02832 C~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
02833 C
02834        SUBROUTINE T96MOD_DIPOLE(PS,X,Y,Z,BX,BY,BZ)
02835 C
02836 C  CALCULATES GSM COMPONENTS OF GEODIPOLE FIELD WITH THE DIPOLE MOMENT
02837 C  CORRESPONDING TO THE EPOCH OF 1980.
02838 C------------INPUT PARAMETERS:
02839 C   PS - GEODIPOLE TILT ANGLE IN RADIANS, X,Y,Z - GSM COORDINATES IN RE
02840 C------------OUTPUT PARAMETERS:
02841 C   BX,BY,BZ - FIELD COMPONENTS IN GSM SYSTEM, IN NANOTESLA.
02842 C
02843 C
02844 C                   AUTHOR: NIKOLAI A. TSYGANENKO
02845 C                           INSTITUTE OF PHYSICS
02846 C                           ST.-PETERSBURG STATE UNIVERSITY
02847 C                           STARY PETERGOF 198904
02848 C                           ST.-PETERSBURG
02849 C                           RUSSIA
02850 C
02851       IMPLICIT NONE
02852 C
02853       REAL*8 PS,X,Y,Z,BX,BY,BZ,PSI,SPS,CPS,P,U,V,T,Q
02854       INTEGER M
02855 
02856       DATA M,PSI/0,5./
02857       IF(M.EQ.1.AND.ABS(PS-PSI).LT.1.E-5) GOTO 1
02858       SPS=SIN(PS)
02859       CPS=COS(PS)
02860       PSI=PS
02861       M=1
02862   1   P=X**2
02863       U=Z**2
02864       V=3.*Z*X
02865       T=Y**2
02866       Q=30574./SQRT(P+T+U)**5
02867       BX=Q*((T+U-2.*P)*SPS-V*CPS)
02868       BY=-3.*Y*Q*(X*SPS+Z*CPS)
02869       BZ=Q*((P+T-2.*U)*CPS-V*SPS)
02870       RETURN
02871       END
